meanings.definition: To doubt or be uncertain about something.
meanings.sent1: She was misdoubting her decision to go on the rollercoaster.
meanings.sent2: I am misdoubting whether I turned off the stove before leaving the house.
meanings.sent3: The cat was misdoubting the new toy before finally pouncing on it.
meanings.sent4: His misdoubting of the weather forecast led to him carrying an umbrella all day.
meanings.sent5: The student's misdoubting of her answer made her raise her hand to ask the teacher.

meanings.definition: To have a lack of confidence in someone or something.
meanings.sent1: He was misdoubting his ability to finish the race.
meanings.sent2: She is misdoubting the reliability of the new product.
meanings.sent3: The detective was misdoubting the suspect's alibi.
meanings.sent4: The team's coach was misdoubting their chances of winning the game.
meanings.sent5: The patient was misdoubting the effectiveness of the new medication.
